name: Arequipa
description:
If it is something original and outstanding you are looking for, don’t look any further, as you won’t find anything more extravagant than this Brazilian bikini. It consists of a triangle top and a Brazilian cut bottom, both decorated with beautiful metallic rings.  The rings are heat resistant and will not irritate your skin.

Arequipa stands out for its beautiful irregular stripes that give it an interesting and trendy look. It features an amazing mix of colors, such as beige, brown, turquoise and blue and is made from LYCRA ®Xtra Life, a resistant material that provides optimal coverage and comfort.

Feel free to match whatever accessories you like, put your favorite sunglasses on and you are ready to hit the beach.

Please see size chart on the Fabrics & Fit page or email info@orixasbrazil.com with any questions.

name: SanRemo
description:
This beautiful Brazilian bikini is composed of a bandeau top with formed cups and a low-rise adjustable bottom. It comes in different shades of orange, white and pink, decorated with pretty floral patterns. Complete the all look with a few bright accessories!

Please see size chart on the Fabrics & Fit page or email info@orixasbrazil.com with any questions.

Brazilian bikinis now available in Vancouver, BC

name: Oncinha
description:
Animal print bikinis are for daring women who do not want to go unnoticed, so if you feel like you belong to this category, you had better stop for a second and take a look at Oncinha, a beautiful Brazilian bikini designed and manufactured to the highest standards in Rio de Janeiro. 

Oncinha is a beautiful Brazilian bikini composed of a tiny triangle top and a Brazilian cut bottom. Its adjustable ties come in a beautiful shade of gold which matches perfectly the leopard print that characterizes the whole bikini. Match it with a few golden accessories and you will look simply stunning. Oncinha is made from LYCRA ®Xtra Life, a top quality material that is known all over the world for its excellent properties. 

Please see size chart on the Fabrics & Fit page or email info@orixasbrazil.com with any questions.

Brazilian bikinis now available in Vancouver, BC

name: Pitinga
description:
Women will make heads turn while strolling along the beach wearing this Brazilian bikini. Featuring Brazilian moderate back coverage without side ties and a non-padded sliding halter top, this attractive bikini is fully lined to avoid embarrassing transparency when wet. With two colours, salmon and white, women are sure to make a splash this summer with this stand-out bikini.

Please see size chart on the Fabrics & Fit page or email info@orixasbrazil.com with any questions.

Brazilian bikinis now available in Vancouver, BC

name: Necktie for Bandeau Tops
description:
Make your bandeau top fun, stylish and versatile with a neck tie.  Instant halter style or create a more defined shape.

We recommend this accessory for all bandeau tops.

name: Costa Do Sauipe
description:
The aquamarine and tropical hues of the Costa do Sauipe Brazilian bikini are reminiscent of the majestic ocean. Subtle stripes give movement to the soft shades and immediately draw the eyes in. The Brazilian bottom ties at one side and has a floral print band to create a captivating focal point. Adding to the enchantment is a twisted bandeau top with formed cups that gives the bikini a feminine contour.

Pair the bandeau top with a white necktie if you want to add versatility.

name: Faro
description:
Combine the sexy style of a classic Brazilian bikini and the wild allure of a colorful animal print in the Faro bikini. This two-piece swimsuit features a sliding triangle top and tie side bottom in an eye-catching brown and aquamarine striped pattern, so you can show off your curves and your tan all at once. This fully lined bikini demands attention in the water, on the beach, or poolside, making it perfect for any occasion.

Please see size chart on the Fabrics & Fit page or email info@orixasbrazil.com with any questions.

Brazilian bikinis now available in Vancouver, BC

name: Buzios
description:
This fantastic Brazilian bikini presents all the features that have made Brazil the number 1 manufacturer of women's swimsuits in the world. The horizontal stripes are aimed at enhancing a woman's curves and the interlaced top underlines the freshness of this unique swimsuit. The metallic rings, placed at the sides, are completely athermic, so that they will not overheat under the sun. The mix of bold and contrasting colours, such as red, white and blue, is sure to make any woman look hotter than ever. Plus, comfort and resistance are assured, as this swimsuit is made with LYCRA® Xtra Life fiber. 

Please see size chart on the Fabrics & Fit page or email info@orixasbrazil.com with any questions.

Brazilian bikinis now available in Vancouver, BC

name: Barcelona
description: Due to popularity this model is currently sold out.  Please message us at info@orixasbrazil.com for future orders.

name: Brava
description:
The main question is, what is a sunga? A sunga is a type of swimsuit which Brazilian men have been sporting on the sandy Brazilian beaches for quite some time now. The trend is spreading and men from all over the world are starting to appreciate this swimsuit. Sunga Brava comes in a bold turquoise and is embellished with two red and white stripes. 

It is made of LYCRA ®XtraLife, which means that it is very comfortable to wear and it won't stretch or shrink, no matter how often you wear it. 

Please see size chart on the Fabrics & Fit page or email info@orixasbrazil.com with any questions.

name: Preto
description:
If you want a comfortable pair of swimming gear but don’t want to don board shorts, then this Brazilian sunga is just what you need. These trunks are in plain black and have elastic waistbands. This pair of Brazilian trunks has a square cut, not too skimpy, so it’s just perfect if you plan to engage in some water sports. These trunks are made with LYCRA® Xtra Life fiber so you can be sure that they are very durable, resistant to chemicals and natural elements and also very comfortable to wear.

Please see size chart on the Fabrics & Fit page or email info@orixasbrazil.com with any questions.

name: Arraial do Cabo
description:
The main question is, what is a sunga? A sunga is a type of swimsuit which Brazilian men have been sporting on the sandy Brazilian beaches for quite some time now. The trend is spreading and men from all over the world are starting to appreciate this swimsuit.  The Brazilian sunga Arraial comes in the colour black with a blue and white pattern on it. The colours and pattern are enough to fit any man's style. Thanks to the full lining, it will not become see through when wet. This swimwear is designed with every man‘s comfort in mind.

Please see size chart on the Fabrics & Fit page or email info@orixasbrazil.com with any questions.

name: Paint
description:
Who said men have to wear a plain bathing suit to the beach? The Brazilian sunga Paint bathing suit is just the opposite of a plain bathing suit. This bathing suit is designed in a blue and white grunge pattern. It was designed to fit all men comfortably throughout the day. Men can go swimming in this fully lined bathing suit without worry because it will not become transparent when wet. 

Please see size chart on the Fabrics & Fit page or email info@orixasbrazil.com with any questions.

name: Leblon
description:
Black with two blue stripes up each side, adds a sporty look to this Brazilian sunga. This bathing suit is a perfect fit, allowing men to go swimming or lay on the beach comfortably. It is fully lined to prevent it from becoming see through when it gets wet.

Please see size chart on the Fabrics & Fit page or email info@orixasbrazil.com with any questions.

name: Listrada
description:
Are you trying to look for a great pair of trunks to wear when you go to the beach this summer? Then better get yourself a Brazilian sunga.  This Brazilian sunga features a striped pattern in red, white, grey and blue. This sunga is guaranteed to be very comfortable and durable. This pair of mid-cut trunks also has a thin elastic waistband and drawstring so it’s sure to fit your body perfectly. They’re the perfect pair to get if you’re planning on engaging in active water sports.

Please see size chart on the Fabrics & Fit page or email info@orixasbrazil.com with any questions.

name: Tie-Dye
description:
Everyone needs a canga.  They are a must have in Brazil and for us at OrixasBrazil Boutique.  We never leave home without one!

We use ours for a beach towel, a beach cover up, beach bag, scarf, blanket, shawl and as a cool fashion accessory.  They are perfect to have with you travelling or even just when you need to brighten up an outfit.

Made from 100% viscose they are extremely easy to care for.  Simply put them in the washer and dryer and they get softer and cozier while maintaining their vibrant colours.
